register-user: insert into user(username, password, email) values(?,?,?)
get-password-hash-by-username: select password from user where username = ?
set-session-hash: update user set sessionkey = ? where username = ?
remove-session-hash: update user set sessionkey = "" where sessionkey = ?
get-bands-of-user: select band.name from band_member inner join user on band_member.user_id = user.user_id inner join band on band_member.band_id = band.band_id where user.sessionkey = ?
get-band-id-by-name: select band_id from band where name = ?
get-song-id-by-name: select song_id from song where name = ?
get-complete-song-list: select song.name from song inner join band on band.band_id = song.band_id where band.name = ?
remove-sessionkey: update user set sessionkey="" where sessionkey = ?
get-song: select song_part.line_number, tab.tab_content, song_part.chords, song_part.text from song_part inner join song on song_part.song_id = song.song_id left join tab on song.song_id = tab.song_id and song_part.line_number = tab.line_number where song.name = ? order by song_part.line_number
get-documents-of-song: select band.name, song.name, song_document.file_name, song_document.md5sum from song_document inner join band on song_document.band_id = band.band_id inner join song on song.song_id = song_document.song_id where band.name = ? and song.name = ?
save-document: insert into song_document(band_id, song_id, file_name, md5) values(?,?,?,?)
